docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama travels back to the United States today, touching down in Washington in the late afternoon to tackle a week likely to be defined by efforts to advance his health care reform proposals.
docs.abstract: President Obama travels back across the pond today, touching down in Washington in the late afternoon to tackle a week likely to be defined by efforts to advance his health care reform proposals.

docs.lead_paragraph: Questions to get to the truth about how the United States will restore the capital markets and its standing in the world.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is unclear how a government health plan may fare in competition with private carriers, and whether it may eventually evolve into the country’s lone health insurer.

headline.main: State Coverage Model No Help for Uneasy Insurance Industry
headline.print_headline: State Coverage Model No Help For Uneasy Insurance Industry

docs.snippet: It is unclear how a government health plan may fare in competition with private carriers, and whether it may eventually evolve into the country’s lone health insurer.

docs.lead_paragraph: If Washington is going to keep the promise of comprehensive health care reform, a lot more money will almost certainly be needed, and that is likely to mean new taxes.
docs.snippet: If Washington is going to keep the promise of comprehensive health care reform, a lot more money will almost certainly be needed, and that is likely to mean new taxes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Cuts in government and nonprofit services are forcing caregivers to assume even more care-related expenses.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama is preparing a push for legislation that will include speeches, town-hall-style meetings and much deeper engagement with lawmakers, officials say.

headline.main: Obama to Forge a Greater Role on Health Care
headline.sub: Planning a Broad Effort to Put His Mark on Legislation;
headline.print_headline: Obama to Forge a Greater Role on Health Care

docs.snippet: President Obama is preparing a push for legislation that will include speeches, town-hall-style meetings and much deeper engagement with lawmakers, officials say.

docs.lead_paragraph: Instead of waiting for health care reform, some doctors are cutting administrative costs, seeing fewer patients and focusing on prevention.

headline.seo: If All Doctors Had More Time to Listen

docs.lead_paragraph: Aretae Lum Ortiz and Thomas Straus Wyler were married Saturday at the Inn at Palmetto Bluff in Bluffton, S.C. Judge Kenneth M. Karas of the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, in White Plains, officiated.

docs.lead_paragraph: With the attention long focused on the rights of gays and lesbians to marry their partners, the couples often don’t consider the dark side: What happens if it doesn’t work out?

docs.lead_paragraph: In his weekly radio and Internet address, the president said he wants to see health care reform that is built around lowering costs, improving quality and coverage and protecting consumer choice.

headline.main: Obama Urges Effort on Health Care
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges Effort to Tackle Health Care Costs

docs.snippet: In his weekly radio and Internet address, the president said he wants to see health care reform that is built around lowering costs, improving quality and coverage and protecting consumer choice.
